places.new-delhi: I was born and raised in New Delhi and spent most of my life there, until I moved to Enschede in 2017. Since then, I visit New Delhi about 3 or 4 times every year.
places.enschede: I moved to Enschede in 2017 to study at the University of Twente, and have lived there ever since.
places.eindhoven: I've visited Eindhoven several times, and presented at the Dutch Design Week in 2018, which is held in there every year.
places.sf-bay-area: I lived in the Bay Area (specifically, East Bay) while studying at Santa Clara University in late 2019, as part of the Global Engineering Education Exchange.
places.gurugram: Since Gurgaon is in the outskirts of Delhi, I've been there countless times; Delhi-NCR is essentially one large city.

alex-imbrea.name: Alex Imbrea
alex-imbrea.intro: Alex and I met while working at El NiÃ±o, the digital development agency in Enschede I was a consultant to. He's a full-stack developer, and we've worked on several projects together.

maurits-van-der-vijgh.name: Maurits van der Vijgh
maurits-van-der-vijgh.intro: Maurits and I met while working at El NiÃ±o, the digital development agency in Enschede I was a consultant to. He's a devops engineer and backend developer, and we've worked on a few projects together.

mateo-sadowski.name: Mateo Sadowski
mateo-sadowski.intro: Mateo studied a module of Creative Technology at the University of Twente as part of an exchange semester, and we attended the Amsterdam Dance Event (ADE) hackathon together. He's a designer based in Los Angeles, California.

mohit-ahuja.name: Mohit Ahuja
mohit-ahuja.intro: Mohit and I met because he was renting the apartment next to mine in the University of Twente, where he was studying Interaction Technology MSc. We've worked on several projects together, mostly during hackathons. He currently works at Scania Group in Sodertalje, Sweden.

akshat-srivastava.name: Akshat Srivastava
akshat-srivastava.intro: Akshat and I met as part of our highschool computer club, MINET, where we worked on several projects together and essentially grew up with each other as designers and developers. He's a design technologist and a Kleiner Perkins Fellow currently based in Cincinnati, Ohio.
